name: Crypt Raider (OddPhishGames)
description:
Here is my version of the game Crypt Raider, from the GameDev.tv course called "Unreal 5.0 C++ Developer: Learn C++ and Make Video Games". In the course I learned about pointers and references, Actor components and Scene components, Header files, Lumen, modular level design, line tracing and collisions, While loops and Arrays, and calling C++ functions from Blueprints. The course covered a lot and I'm glad I could finish it. 

Some things I added to the game myself are:

Footsteps, music, and sound effects. (with reverb for indoors), Post processing, Win conditions, on screen control prompts and UI elements, and some extra decorations in the level.

Any feedback is much appreciated, so please play and comment what you liked about it or if there's anything I could have done better
